settings.heading: Strengthen Your Foundation with PEBLZ
settings.text: Our innovative cork pieces offer a unique way to enhance your foot muscles through simple, effective exercises.
settings.spin_text: Drag to view 360 spin of Pebble

settings.heading: Learn The Exercises & positioning
settings.text:
I am purposely trying to stay away from stating that PEBLZ will heal/cure particular foot conditions. I think “treat” might be a better way to discuss the work and also prevention. There are 4 exercises- what I call the Foundational Four. Each one has specific benefits for common foot problems. What I have discovered and strongly believe is that most foot problems stem from a weak arch that results in a mis-aligned skeletal anatomy. A strong foot is a healthy foot. People will be searching for help with plantar fasciitis, bunions, arch support, and neuropathy.

  • The Plantar Foot and Calf stretch- great for plantar fasciitis, runners and calf cramps
  • The 51’s- great for balance training, neuropathy, and morton’s neuroma
  • The Arch-Pop great for fallen arches, flat feet, bunions, and weight training
  • The Gait Keeper- great for running, posture and hip & knee pain

settings.text: The Plantar Foot and Calf stretch- great for plantar fasciitis, runners and calf cramps.

settings.heading: The Peak
settings.text: Designed to apply pressure with precision

settings.heading: The slope
settings.text: Mimics the natural arch of the foot

settings.heading: The mound
settings.text: Designed for a snug fit just in front of the heel

settings.heading: The cliff
settings.text: Allows clearance to work toes individually

settings.heading: healthier feet anywhere, anytime.
settings.text: Choose Peblz for a natural, effective, and sustainable approach to foot strengthening. Join the movement towards stronger, healthier feet today.

settings.heading: The Birth of Peblz
settings.text: Pre-pandemic, I offered hands-on therapy with great results. COVID ended in-person sessions, and a client requested Zoom sessions, inspiring the creation of Peblz.

settings.heading: The Power of Arch-Pop
settings.text: As COVID eased, in-person treatments revealed "The Arch-Pop" exercise, which strengthened and aligned feet. Seeing its impact, I shared it widely and created Peblz to support the arch.

settings.heading: Crafting Peblz
settings.text: Experimenting with an old cork yoga wedge, I realized a symmetrical shape didn't work. I carved asymmetrical prototypes to reflect foot anatomy. Dedicated clients tested and provided feedback, leading to the creation of PEBLZ XO.

settings.heading: The origin of PEBLZ
settings.text: Explore Peblz' origin - crafted from premium cork for sustainable foot fitness.

settings.heading: plantar foot & calf stretch
settings.text:
• Don’t lean forward-shift your weight
  • Round 1 keep your knee super straight
  • Round 2 stay grounded on your outer heel

settings.heading: Pointers for 51s
settings.text:
• Don’t let your ankle move side to side
  • Work one foot at a time and double prop using the spare pebl in the standard position
  • Try it seated for better dexterity

settings.heading: Arch-pop
settings.text:
• Cramps are OK just keep going
  • Stay engaged at 5
  • Adjust the pebl for a smaller lift for easier access to the ball of #1

settings.heading: gait keeper
settings.text:
• Keep moving
  • Keep your focus straight ahead
  • Small bends

settings.heading: For Athletes
